text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump 130,000 dead from #COVID19. If @realDonaldTrump continues to screw up the U.S. response, we're sure to have many more deaths -- meaning more job openings to be filled and, thus, less unemployment! Funny how that works. 🙄
